text: Guido Burgstaller (29 April 1989 in Villach) is an Austrian football player. The forward plays for SK Rapid Wien in the Austrian Bundesliga. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Europe Other Total League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals FC Kärnten 2006–07 Austrian 2.
